Rune: Death.name: Rune: Death
Rune: Death.description: You learn Rune of Death, allowing you to manipulate unholy power.

Gesture: Fan.name: Gesture: Fan
Gesture: Fan.description: You learn the Fan gesture, allowing you to cast arcane power in a limited arc.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While it remains motionless, the @ref[actor.name]{creature} is indistinguishable from some other object or material.

archetype.name: Elemental Sprite
archetype.description: Sprites are lesser elementals which are embodiments of their raw element, but lack the sapience of their greater kin.

taxonomy.name: Skeleton
taxonomy.description: Undeathly denizens fashioned of bone and sinew.

Rune: Flame.name: Rune: Flame
Rune: Flame.description:
The chaotic force of elemental, thermal energy. The Flame rune governs fire and heat. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Frost.

The Flame rune scales using Intellect, targets Reflex, and deals Fire damage to Health.

Fire Absorption.name: Fire Absorption
Fire Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within scorching environments. Its Fire resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Gesture: Fan.name: Gesture: Fan
Gesture: Fan.description:
Focus the essence of a rune into a sweeping or splintered arc to strike multiple targets in close proximity. If used with Earth, this might hurl a spray of stone in an arc, while using it with Kinesis might carve a slice across multiple foes.

The Fan gesture scales using Intellect and targets a 120 degree, 6 foot cone, dealing 6 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Aspect.name: Gesture: Aspect
Gesture: Aspect.description:
Infuse the essence of a Rune into the self, empowering your own physical form or psyche.

When you assume a certain Aspect, you become more closely attuned to the damage type of the Rune used in your spell. You gain +2 Resistance to that damage type, and deal an additional +2 Damage whenever dealing damage of that type.

Your Aspect lasts for 6 Rounds. You may only have one active Aspect, casting another spell using the Aspect gesture replaces the previous effect.

archetype.name: Elemental Visitor
archetype.description: Visitors are embodiments of raw elemental energy that assume forms that are vaguely humanoid in shape. Unlike their lesser kin, Elemental Visitors are are capable of communication and understanding, although their motivations are seldom aligned with those of mortals.

taxonomy.name: Fire Elemental
taxonomy.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Fire.

Gesture: Arrow.name: Gesture: Arrow
Gesture: Arrow.description:
You learn the Arrow gesture, allowing you to hurl a directed bolt of arcane power towards a distant target.

The Arrow gesture deals damage corresponding to the Rune used to a single enemy target at range.

Rune: Lightning.name: Rune: Lightning
Rune: Lightning.description: You learn Rune of Lightning, allowing you to control volatile arcane surges of electricity.

Electricity Absorption.name: Electricity Absorption
Electricity Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to take lightning blasts in stride. Its Electricity resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While it remains motionless, the @ref[actor.name]{creature} is indistinguishable from some other object or material.

Gesture: Fan.description:
Focus the essence of a rune into a sweeping or splintered arc to strike multiple targets in close proximity. If used with Earth, this might hurl a spray of stone in an arc, while using it with Kinesis might carve a slice across multiple foes.

The Fan gesture scales using Intellect and targets a 120 degree, 6 foot cone, dealing 6 base damage on a successful attack.

archetype.name: Elemental Sprite
archetype.description: Sprites are lesser elementals which are embodiments of their raw element, but lack the sapience of their greater kin.

taxonomy.name: Storm Elemental
taxonomy.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Lightning.

Rune: Flame.name: Rune: Flame
Rune: Flame.description: You learn Rune of Flame, allowing you to weave the arcane element of fire.

Gesture: Fan.name: Gesture: Fan
Gesture: Fan.description: You learn the Fan gesture, allowing you to cast arcane power in a limited arc.

Fire Absorption.name: Fire Absorption
Fire Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within scorching environments. Its Fire resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

archetype.description: Sprites are lesser elementals which are embodiments of their raw element, but lack the sapience of their greater kin.

taxonomy.name: Fire Elemental
taxonomy.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Fire.

Rune: Lightning.name: Rune: Lightning
Rune: Lightning.description:
The chaotic force of raw, electrical energy. The Lightning rune governs sources of electrical energy and electrical discharge. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Earth.

The Lightning rune scales using Intellect, targets Reflex, and deals Electrical damage to Health.

Electricity Absorption.name: Electricity Absorption
Electricity Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to take lightning blasts in stride. Its Electricity resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Gesture: Fan.description:

The Fan gesture scales using Intellect and targets a 120 degree, 6 foot cone, dealing 6 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Aspect.name: Gesture: Aspect
Gesture: Aspect.description:

When you assume a certain Aspect, you become more closely attuned to the damage type of the Rune used in your spell. You gain +2 Resistance to that damage type, and deal an additional +2 Damage whenever dealing damage of that type.

Your Aspect lasts for 6 Rounds. You may only have one active Aspect, casting another spell using the Aspect gesture replaces the previous effect.

archetype.description: Visitors are embodiments of raw elemental energy that assume forms that are vaguely humanoid in shape. Unlike their lesser kin, Elemental Visitors are are capable of communication and understanding, although their motivations are seldom aligned with those of mortals.

taxonomy.name: Storm Elemental
taxonomy.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Lightning.

Cold Absorption.name: Cold Absorption
Cold Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within frigid environments. Its Cold resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} may move through a space as narrow as 1 inch in diameter without any penalty to its Stride. It is immune to the @Condition[restrained] condition.

Rune: Frost.name: Rune: Frost
Rune: Frost.description:
The orderly force of elemental, thermal energy. The Frost rune governs sources of ice and cold. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Flame.

The Frost rune scales using Wisdom, targets Fortitude, and deals Cold damage to Health.

Aqueous Transmission.name: Aqueous Transmission
Aqueous Transmission.description: The @ref[name] is able to move instantaneously through water.

aqueousTransmission.name: Aqueous Transmission
aqueousTransmission.description: When the @ref[name] is within water, it can instantaneously transport itself to any unoccupied space within the same body of water up to 120 feet away. It does not need to be able to see the destination to make this Move.

Gesture: Fan.name: Gesture: Fan
Gesture: Fan.description:
Focus the essence of a rune into a sweeping or splintered arc to strike multiple targets in close proximity. If used with Earth, this might hurl a spray of stone in an arc, while using it with Kinesis might carve a slice across multiple foes.

The Fan gesture scales using Intellect and targets a 120 degree, 6 foot cone, dealing 6 base damage on a successful attack.

taxonomy.name: Frost Elemental
taxonomy.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Frost.

Rune: Frost.name: Rune: Frost
Rune: Frost.description: You learn Rune of Frost, allowing you to channel the arcane element of ice.

Gesture: Influence.name: Gesture: Influence
Gesture: Influence.description:
You learn the Influence gesture, allowing you to heighten or diminish an arcane phenomenon at close range.

The Influence gesture is a stronger evolution of the Touch gesture, dealing more damage or healing but requiring 2 Action to perform.

Cold Absorption.name: Cold Absorption
Cold Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within frigid environments. Its Cold resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

taxonomy.name: Frost Elemental
taxonomy.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Frost.

Rune: Earth.name: Rune: Earth
Rune: Earth.description:
The orderly force of elemental earth, responsible for physical matter. The Earth rune governs health and matters relating to biological growth. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Lightning.

The Earth rune scales using Wisdom, targets Reflex, and deals Acid damage to Health.

Acid Absorption.name: Acid Absorption
Acid Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within acidic environments. Its Acid resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

taxonomy.description: Elemental creatures corresponding to the element of Earth.

Rune: Earth.name: Rune: Earth
Rune: Earth.description: You learn Rune of Earth, allowing you to control tectonic and corrosive forces.

Gesture: Ray.name: Gesture: Ray
Gesture: Ray.description: You learn the Ray gesture, allowing you to manifest arcane energy in a concentrated line.
